item.title: sequence assembly
item.description: Mapping assembly (Reference assembly) assembling reads against an existing backbone sequence De Novo assembly assembling reads without using a template OLC 1. Overlap 2. Layout 3. Consensus De-Brujin Graph Greedy

item.title: SOP of bacteria sequencing analysis
item.description: Quality control QC tools (FastQC, MultiQC …) Is coverage enough ? Is length read length enough ? Is there contamination ? Assembly Assembler tools (Canu, Unicycler, Flye, Ra …) Genome Polishing (Racon, medaka, nanopolish …) Plasmid check(BLAST) Genome annotation NCBI annotation COG analysis for protein functions 16S rRNA/whole genome phylogenetic trees Antibiotic-resistant gene prediction

item.title: About
item.description: Hugo is the worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites. It is written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: https://github.com/russross/blackfriday https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma https://github.com/muesli/smartcrop https://github.com/spf13/cobra https://github.com/spf13/viper Learn more and contribute on GitHub.
